ExecDesc.value: Oracle Database Server XDB PITRIG_TRUNCATE Procedure Buffer Overflow (IPv6 Version)

EngDesc.value: There exists a buffer overflow vulnerability in Oracle Database Server product. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of arguments supplied to procedure PITRIG_TRUNCATE in XDB.XDB_PITRIG_PKG package. A remote attacker with valid user credentials may leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code within the security context of the affected service. (IPv6 Version)
